participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Creative and ambitious, she is passionate about fashion and strives to make her mark in the industry.
participant_1.background: My inspirations are alexander mcqueen and coco chanel. Since young I have loved fashion. I love to go shopping and inspire myself in stylish stores. My desire is to become a fashion designer. I moved to ny to study in a prestigious designing school.

participant_2.name: Bella
participant_2.personality: Energetic and outgoing, she enjoys entertaining her audience and sharing her love for makeup.
participant_2.background: I am a youtube. My car is pink. I have a cat named leela. I make videos about makeup.

content.text: Hi, my name is Sarah. I'm a fashion designer in training.
Hi Sarah, I'm Bella. I'm a YouTube makeup artist.
Oh that's cool! I love watching makeup tutorials.
Thanks! I like making them.
What's your favorite thing about being a YouTube makeup artist?
I love being able to share my passion for makeup with others.
That's a great reason. I'm sure you're very inspiring to your viewers.
I hope so! I try my best.
So, what's your favorite makeup look to do?
I love doing bold, colorful looks.
Me too! I think they're so much fun.
Yeah, they're a great way to express your creativity.
So, what's your favorite makeup product?
I love liquid lipsticks. They're so comfortable to wear and they always look so good.
I agree! They're my favorite too.
What's your favorite makeup brand?
I love Urban Decay. Their products are always so high quality.
Yeah, they're my favorite too.
So, what's your favorite makeup look that you've ever done?
I did a really cool rainbow look for a photoshoot a few months ago. It was really fun to put together.
That sounds amazing! I would love to see it.
I'll send you a picture!
Thanks! I'm excited to see it.
